creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: grey and white parallel lines in foreground (rock garden?); trees and shrubs in middle ground; building in maroon and lavender topped with a rooster at center background
inscription: Left, in grey: [一九六三年　銀閣寺の庭] {1963nen saku, ?????}; bottom, in pencil: [Ginkakuji Garden] [Toshi Yoshida]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with embossing
title: Ginkakuji Garden
